  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:aspect:eri/10003</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>aspect:eri/10003</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Računalniško omrežje</string>
            <string language="en">Computer network</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Computernetz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réseau informatique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Rede de computador</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rete di calcolatore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δίκτυο υπολογιστών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Red de ordenadores</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Poglavje o računalniškem omrežju v sklopu e-gradiva za računalništvo in informatiko. Vsebina poglavja: računalniška mreža, topologije, izmenjava podatkov, iskanje po spletu, nevarnosti in zaščita</string>
            <string language="en">Chapter about computer network, part of e-materials for computer science and informatics. Chapter contents: computer network, network topology, exchanging data, searching the web, safety and protection</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">računalniško omrežje</string>
            <string language="en">computer network</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">računalnik</string>
            <string language="en">computer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">komunikacija</string>
            <string language="en">communication</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">iskanje</string>
            <string language="en">searching</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">zaščita</string>
            <string language="en">protection</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kapitel über Computernetz, Teil Ematerialien 
für Informatik und Informatik. Kapitelinhalt: 
Computernetz, Netztopologie, die Daten austauschend und suchen 
das Web, die Sicherheit und den Schutz</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chapitre au sujet de réseau informatique, partie
d'e-matériels pour l'informatique et informatique. Contenu de 
chapitre : réseau informatique, topologie de réseau, permutant
des données, recherchant le Web, la sûreté et la protection</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Capítulo sobre a rede de computador, parte dos 
e-materiais para a informática de e informatics. Índices do 
capítulo: rede de computador, topologia da rede, trocando os 
dados, procurarando o Web, a segurança e a proteção</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Capitolo circa la rete di calcolatore facente 
parte i e-materiali per informatica ed informatica. Soddisfare 
di capitolo: rete di calcolatore, topologia della rete, 
scambiando i dati, cercanti il Web, la sicurezza e la protezione</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κεφάλαιο για το δίκτυο υπολογιστών, μέρος των 
ε-υλικών για την πληροφορική και την πληροφορική. 
Περιεχόμενο κεφαλαίου: δίκτυο υπολογιστών, τοπολογία 
δικτύων, ανταλλάσσοντας τα στοιχεία, που ψάχνουν τον Ιστό, την 
ασφάλεια και την προστασία</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Capítulo sobre la red de ordenadores, parte de 
los e-materiales para la informática e informática. Contenido 
del capítulo: red de ordenadores, topología de la red, 
intercambiando los datos, buscando el Web, la seguridad y la 
protección</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Computernetz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Computer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
